skillTree.name: Barded Skeletal Steed
skillTree.description: A skeletal warhorse fashioned in the cathayan aesthetic; a favored mount by the equally macabre jade-blooded vampires.

skillTree.name: Necro-Longma
skillTree.description: A great jade longma raised unto undeath; its trampling hooves and draconian wings imbued with necrotic magic.

skillTree.name: Aura of Dark Majesty
skillTree.description: This Lord of Undeath projects an aura of dominion that can wilt the most iron-willed mortals.

skillTree.name: Jiangshi Master
skillTree.description: The feared Jiangshi are the mindless thralls of the Jade-Blooded Vampires. Their inhuman resilience and supernatural strength makes them the ideal minions.

effects.description:
Melee defense: +5% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +8% for Jiangshi units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dark Pact
skillTree.description: A dark pact has been made with darker Gods to guarantee victory.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Dark Knight
skillTree.description: "See my coat of crimson armour? It is strengthened by thine blood and fear."

skillTree.name: Beguile
skillTree.description: "Look into mine eyes, mortal; what glories do you see?"

skillTree.name: Quickblood
skillTree.description: The sword-strikes of mortal man are but clumsy, childish lunges before the preternatural speed of a Vampire.

skillTree.name: Master Strike
skillTree.description: Strike hard, strike true.

skillTree.name: Curse of the Revenant
skillTree.description: The strength of this Vampire to endure the centuries is beyond compare.

skillTree.name: Supernatural Horror
skillTree.description: To look upon this Undead Lord is to witness true and absolute horror!

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
Hit point replenishment cap not reached

Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gaze of Nagash Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Call From the Beyond
skillTree.description: A rusty bell is rang and hateful spirits of the dead are roused from the underworld, clawing and howling, upon the mortal realm.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Spell number of uses: +1 for "Call From the Beyond" and "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Range: +50% to "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "Call From the Beyond Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Curse of Years"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Wind of Death"
Winds of Magic cost: -4 for "Wind of Death Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Wind of Death Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.name: Greater Arcane Conduit
skillTree.description: "Forces of Necromancy, hear the request of your most-studious adept: flow through me according to my will!"

skillTree.name: Aura of Supremacy
skillTree.description: "I am mighty, none dare challenge me!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

skillTree.name: Army of the Damned
skillTree.description: "A wall of decaying flesh and bone slowly advanced towards us, implacable and utterly remorseless."

effects.description:
Melee defense: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units 
	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +6 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee defense: +8 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, and Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call of the Night
skillTree.description: "Can you hear it… the call of the night? Time for its children to arise and swarm."

effects.description:
Speed: +6% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +9% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Speed: +12% for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Fell Bats and Dire Wolves units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cursed Ghosts
skillTree.description: In the East, tales of ghosts are often brought up to scare and discipline children or spread around as petty entertainment, but in crumbling abodes and forgotten clanhouses, lingering spirits exist, languishing in murderous rage.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +8% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +4% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +16% for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Spirit Host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui and Pale Lady units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Monsters of the Nether
skillTree.description: The Cathayan underworld is home to many immetarial creatures, and some of these aren't as benevolent as Cathay's venerated ancestors.

effects.description:
Physical resistance: +6% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +8% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +9 for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Mogwai, Yaoguai, Devil of Dark Omen, and Underworld Gate Guardian units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Revenant Heroes
skillTree.description: "Charge, brothers! We are sworn-comrades in life, and now, in DEATH! For Xen Yang! For the Dragon Emperor!"

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +9 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +7 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +11 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +9 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +13 for Youxia Revenants units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Eastern Terrors
skillTree.description: Grandy Cathay is home to many supernatural abominations that stalk the night and maliciously feast upon the populace's nightmares.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +15% for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +11 for Jiangshi, Blood Lions and Cursed Jade Carriage units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Dead of the Orient
skillTree.description: The endurance of boogeymen and other nightly frights that haunt the Cathayan psyche is perhaps one of the more intriguing aspects of their culture.

effects.description:
Armour +8 for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: +10% for Chanters, Returned, Crypt Ghouls, Unearthed Laborers, Revenants, Blood Lions and Jiangshi units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cruel Souls
skillTree.description: Not only satisfied in enacting revenge, some spirits go as far as to inflict misery and torment upon the living out of misplaced wrath and perceived injustices.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Infantry: +7 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spirit host, Starved Marquis, Accursed Diao Si Gui, Pale Lady, and Underworld Gate Guardian units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Nightmares of the Dark
skillTree.description: At sunset, when all the windows are barred and the crows have cawwed, the dread denizens of the night encroach upon the world of mortals from the shadows.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Fell bats, Dire wolves, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Fell bats, Dire wolves, Mogwai, Devil of Dark Omen and Yaoguai (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Parade of Midnight
skillTree.description: Deathless horses with eyes that burn like brimstone and hooves that leave trails of ghostflame; the jade banner flashes its accursed colors.

effects.description:
Missile resistance: +15% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +8% for Youxia revenants and Cursed Jade Carriage units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Restless Dead
skillTree.description: A Lord of Necromancy's minions do not suffer exhaustion, they can walk for leagues and never suffer.

skillTree.name: Undying Horde
skillTree.description: Once slain in battle, the foe belongs to the Undead Lord, and will rise again, eager to serve.

effects.description: The Dead Rise Again: +5% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +10% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle
The Dead Rise Again: +15% hit points for destroyed units restored after battle

skillTree.name: Children of the Night
skillTree.description: A powerful, vigorous Lord of Darkness will see the Children of the Night gather unto them.

effects.description:
Character experience gain: +10%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Character experience gain: +30%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Darkling Skies
skillTree.description: The sun is no ally of the dead - a sky scorched black, or darkest night, will invigorate the Unliving.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ancient Cunning
skillTree.description: Such long-lived creatures develop a level of guile that mortals cannot match.

skillTree.name: Immortal Horror
skillTree.description: Such a beast is all but impossible to destroy - an immortal horror doomed to haunt eternity!

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Guile & Glamour
skillTree.description: A simple glamour can disguise a monstrous Vampire or Liche, so they may then charm and beguile the local populace.

skillTree.name: Necrarch
skillTree.description: W'soran's scions are masters at the art of Necromancy, to dabble in such will be a boon.

skillTree.name: Eternal Warden
skillTree.description: This Lord has endless forbearance, a timeless patience crafted over millennia.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -10% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

Attrition: -15% when under siege
	(armies in local owned region)

skillTree.name: Uncanny Prescience
skillTree.description: This Lord can hear the thoughts of mortals for leagues around, and plan accordingly.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve minimum: +15
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Dark Majesty
backgroundSkills.description: "Glory in your dark majesty, my lord."

backgroundSkills.name: Devious
backgroundSkills.description: Vampires and their liche-servants are devious creatures; manipulative with many mortal servants in their thrall.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%
	(Heroes in local province)

Hero action success chance: +5%
	(Heroes in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Dread Incarnate
backgroundSkills.description: "They will tremble, my lord, oh, they will fear!"

effects.description:
Enemy leadership: -4
	(enemy armies in local province)

backgroundSkills.name: Lore Keeper
backgroundSkills.description: Once forbidden knowledge is acquired, Necromancers and Vampires will jealously guard it from rivals' eyes.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic power reserve: +1 per turn
	(own army)

Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +8
	(own army)

backgroundSkills.name: Master of the Black Arts
backgroundSkills.description: A master indeed - to rival the Great Necromancer himself?

effects.description:
Miscast base chance: -10% for all spellcasters
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +10%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Determined
backgroundSkills.description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached
